title: Beaurepaires Font
content:
Hello everyone,

My friend and I have been racking our brains over this one for a while. I haven't been able to find any official documentation from Beaurepaires regarding their new logo either. It's a more geometric, less human version of Helvetica with horizontal and vertical terminals.

Any ideas?

Vincent

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020161033im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Beaurepaires_5213.png)
author: vbschan

comments.content: Yes, I think that's it! Thank you!
